Mea Culpa Mea Culpa!
	Very sorry to report folks that I misunderstood yeste=
rdays report. We did indeed sell out all tables - we did indeed sell out ou=
r block of rooms - the hotel did expand our block to accommodate more of us=
 - HOWEVER the Sword Show rate expired 30 days before the show, so there ar=
e no more rooms available at the special rate.
	It will still be a great sh=
ow and well worth it, even if the bargain rate no longer applies=85
-t
Thom=
as C Helm
www.toryu-mon.com
2013 NTHK West Coast Shinsa
